disclaimer.alertText: This document describes risks, limitations, and transparency commitments of our products and communications. Read carefully. Nothing here constitutes investment, legal, accounting, or tax advice. Purchase decisions are personal and voluntary.

sections.heading: 1) Scope and Nature of Information
items: Whitepapers, institutional pages, and marketing materials are informative and educational in nature.
Information may be updated without prior notice; newer versions replace older ones.
Materials do not constitute promises of profitability, performance guarantees, or personalized advice.

sections.heading: 2) User Profile and Suitability
items: Products involving cryptoassets are intended for users over 18 with risk tolerance.
You are responsible for evaluating objectives, investment horizon, and financial suitability.
We recommend seeking independent advice when necessary.

sections.heading: 3) Market Risks
items: High volatility: prices may fluctuate significantly and result in total loss of capital.
Variable liquidity: buying and selling may be limited at certain times.
Counterparty risk, systemic market risk, and external shocks may affect value.

sections.heading: 4) Operational and Technological Risks
items: Software, networks, wallets, integrators, or third-party providers may fail, causing downtime or losses.
Attacks, bugs, hard forks, and protocol changes may impact usability and token value.
Security measures are applied under best practices, without total risk elimination.

sections.heading: 5) Compliance and Regulation
items: We operate under the legislation applicable to our activities (e.g., Law 14.478/2022 and related rules).
If any product is qualified as a security, rules from the competent authority will be observed.
Users are responsible for complying with local laws, including tax obligations, in their country of residence.

sections.heading: 6) Transparency and Controls
items: Official wallets, locks, and schedules are disclosed in the Transparency section of the website.
Liquidity and market defense policies are public and may be adjusted with justification.
Audits and on-chain proofs are prioritized to strengthen ecosystem trust.

sections.heading: 7) Data and Privacy
items: Personal data is processed in accordance with the Privacy Policy and applicable legislation.
We adopt technical and organizational measures to protect data, respecting user rights.
Logs and metrics may be collected for security, fraud prevention, and service improvement.

sections.heading: 8) Liability Limitations
items: To the extent permitted by law, liability is excluded for indirect damages, lost profits, and lost opportunities.
Nothing in this document waives consumer rights provided by law or unavoidable legal responsibilities.
Continuous service availability is not guaranteed; downtime may occur.

sections.heading: 9) Intellectual Property
items: Brands, names, content, and software are protected by intellectual property rights.
Copying, reverse engineering, unauthorized commercial exploitation, or misuse of materials is prohibited.

sections.heading: 10) Languages and Prevalence
items: We provide translations for user convenience.
In case of discrepancies, the English version prevails.
In Brazil, ambiguities are interpreted in favor of the consumer, under applicable law.

sections.heading: 11) Official Communications
items: Official channels are published on the Institutional page; distrust unlisted contacts.
We never request private keys, 2FA codes, or value transfers without confirmation in official channels.

sections.heading: 12) Acceptance
items: By continuing to browse and/or use our products, you declare that you have read, understood, and accepted these terms.
We recommend saving/recording the reading date for your reference.

disclaimer.footer: MoonRise Commitment: transparency, security, and responsible execution, with long-term focus and respect for the user.
